metadata.name: DMT King - Live Music NFT
metadata.description:
This is the first music NFT from Bob Amor.

It‚Äôs an original song written and recorded live by Bob.

Artwork is by the talented Jon Winchell, and is inspired by Bored Ape Yacht Club #3152.

The song "DMT King" can be downloaded on all major music platforms, but there will only be 420 versions of the NFT.

Each NFT song is part of a bigger vision of Bob's that will unfold as new songs drop.

Hodl onto each NFT because they will all be used to unlock future perks and utility.
